SEARCH
Module com.example.demosudoku
Package com.example.demosudoku.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.demosudoku.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard
public class Board extends Object implements IBoard
Represents a 6x6 Sudoku board divided into 2x3 blocks. Provides methods to generate, validate, and manage Sudoku logic.

Each cell may contain a number between 1 and 6 (0 means empty). The board ensures that numbers do not repeat in rows, columns, or 2x3 blocks.

Java JDK 17.
